<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
